statements: DELETE FROM customers WHERE loyalty_program_id = '98765432-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND loyalty_points < 1000;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM loyalty_programs WHERE program_name = 'Gold Loyalty Program';

DELETE FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
